title: Cant connect to the server(Has been going for about a week and a half
body:
every time i try to log in i get a login error that says the login server did not respond blah blah blah.Ive tried a lot of the solutions but none of them have worked 
Any ideas on how to fix would be much appreciated

replies.body:
I just had this problem for 2 days!
I made NO changes, everything worked fine for months, then no connecty.

THE FIX THAT WORKED FOR ME! -
(on windows Vista)

1- open internet explorer (v.9 for me)
2- go to Tools (in the task bar) - Internet Options - click the Advanced Tab
3- scroll down the Setting window to the Security section
4- make sure USE SSL 2.0, USE SSL 3.0, and USE TLS 1.0 are all checked. (USE TLS 1.0 was not checked in my case)
5- at this point i just closed IE and I could then log in with no trouble.
I did not require a restart.

After a restart everything appears to be working still.
(hopefully this helps with the dc's i've been getting)

If this doesn't work, try:

-updating your Internet Explorer to the latest version
-resetting your browser's settings, "internet options" > "advanced" > "reset"

GOOD LUCK
